title: Is Tencent selling/giving your meta data to China.
body:
Imagine what the meta data looks like for a strategy game like this and what a military could do with it using it in some kind of war simulator. Reaction times? mental strategy? understanding and predicting your own reactions? 

Netflixx knows what you will chose to watch 30 seconds before you do with their AI systems.

China has an AI system that can scan every person in their country in 1.2 seconds. 

If you think what facebook did was bad imagine what the gaming companies have been doing and why tencent was allowed to buy up all these American asset video games.
